timeline.message: Moves Activity references to AppCompatActivity for non list activities
Creates ListActivity impl based on AppCompatActivity
Uses spinner mode for Date and Time Widgets
removed override as we don't have any 4.3 devices and onMenuItemSelected is final in AppCompat
Modify switch button to have text out of the switch itself as the switch button in app compat does not seem to support inline texts well
Search view fixes plus removes some pre honeycomb related code
Set edittext styling to material design default
handle activities with no action bar
turn on vecotr drawables support through support libs
Date time widget styling, show calendar true in date time
remove use of vector drawables on pre-21 devices as it doesn't not seem to support some edge cases like inflating in a custom view

timeline.bodyText: removed since text color is set as desired by itself.
timeline.author: shubham1g5

timeline.bodyText: titles are enabled by default with AppCompat, disabling them here for HorizontalPaneledChoiceDialog to keep them same as earlier.
timeline.author: shubham1g5
shubham1g5

timeline.message: Makes uninstall button consistent with others

timeline.bodyText: nit: Would be great to have some docs here.
timeline.author: ShivamPokhriyal

timeline.bodyText: nit: Would be good to replace the variable names: v -> view and l -> parent?
timeline.author: ShivamPokhriyal

replies.bodyText: not changing this to be consistent with ListActivity.java
replies.author: shubham1g5

timeline.bodyText: Ohh strange. Is this not needed anymore?
timeline.author: ShivamPokhriyal

replies.bodyText:
Two reasons why I removed this -

onMenuItemSelected is final in AppCompatActivity demanding a change here
This will only be applicable for api v17 devices and quick look through analytics suggest that we don't have any users on api-17 devices.
replies.author: shubham1g5

replies.bodyText:
This will only be applicable for api v17 devices and quick look through analytics suggest that we don't have any users on api-17 devices.

This doesn't seem true anymore. Suddently there is an influx of devices on v17. Unfortunately BS doesn't have any devices less than 4.4 for me to test any new implementations of this method. Therefore committed an alternative change to this which removes setting spannable to the Context menu. This was redundant there as we don't have any formatting anyway in that context menu and just plain strings. So there is no use of using Spannnables there.  Also love how useful the links to tickets in PRs are. I was able to track this down to http://manage.dimagi.com/default.asp?174626
replies.author: shubham1g5

timeline.message: Removes spanned styling from context menu to avoid crash on < v18 devices, google issue #47831, #174626
removes dependency on internal android action bar view name
